scripts.test: cd src; jade -o '{ filename: "." }' -O ../tmp *jade; cd .. && cp -a bootstrap css images js tmp; npm run-script install-google-verification; npm run-script open-index
scripts.doc: git checkout gh-pages; cd .; rm -rf bootstrap css images js *html; mv tmp/* . && rm -r tmp && git add -A \* && git commit -a -m 'regenerated docs'; git pull --rebase; echo file:///`pwd`/index.html; echo 'git push origin gh-pages --force; git checkout master'
